room_title: Escape room "Benedict's Study" by Paradox Point in Saginaw
room_description:
War carries many uncertainties. Lies and deception are traded like ammunition and it is easy to sneak backstage when everyone's focused on the show. Benedict Arnold of the Sons of Liberty was well aware of that.
Using his growing influence with the likes of George Washington, Benedict never let an advantageous opportunity pass him by. That's how a hidden chest full of gold under his protection was deemed lost and forgotten in time.
While many have searched for the treasure Benedict claimed had sunk in the Dead River none have found it. What has been found, however, is Benedict Arnold's study overflowing with literature and secrets that may reveal something far shinier than dusty books.
More than one person holds the key to Benedict's mysterious study. Will you be the first to claim the prize?
